entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
